Levels consist of a text file of 15 rows, where each character represents
a 16x16 pixel tile. There are 22 columns total, 20 of which are visible.
The remaining 4 are for offscreen things like zombie spawners and
offscreen platforms for the zombies to stand on.

Legend:

Scoreboard = s,
Ground w/ grass = g,
Ground w/o grass (rocks) = r,
Nothing (sky) = n,
Edge node left (for NPCs) = e
